document_data.name: Khatja
document_data.mainbody: '''Khatja''' was a [[half-orc]] muscle of the adventuring company - the [[Lady's Lament]] from [[Waterdeep]], active ''circa'' [[1310 DR]].
document_data.Description: Unlike her mate, Khatja was a chaotic woman who venerated the ferocity of [[barbarian]]s. Khatja wielded her giant two-handed [[broadsword]] in battle.
document_data.History:
Several years before the {{YearlinkName|1310}}, Khatja, along with her mate [[Geldin]], joined the Lady's Lament and quickly gained respect for their strength. The couple rarely talked about their past, but one thing was known about them - they have been ostracised by both [[human]]s and [[orc]]s alike.

In 1310 DR, the Lady's Lament, along with many other mercenaries, traveled from [[Luskan]] to the besieged city of [[Targos]] in the [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
